value:
$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Well, well, Prince Alfonse? Have
you reconsidered your position now?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What you said was true.$k$pThat can only mean that you must
be behind the dark enclosures...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Indeed. But don't assume that
you can attack me here to solve
your little conundrum.$k$pMy soldiers will not hesitate to shield
me as I make my escape...and allow
me to close off yet another village.$k$pYour only option is to give Veronica
to me. Until then...$k$pHelp me keep track of how many
villages you lose before you give
me what I want.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...N-never!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|If you won't come to your senses,
I suppose I have no choice but to
follow through on my promises...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|Wait.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Veronica?! How did you—
What are you doing here?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Even with your wounds, you followed
us all the way out here? Wh-why?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|I...am turning myself in.$k$pLeave Askr...out of this. This has
nothing...to do with them.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Very well. Seize her.$k$pRemember: Traitors get no better
treatment than any prisoner of war.
If she resists, break her legs.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Veronica, wait! You can't... We can't
let you go like this!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|...Shut up. You are my enemies...
I owe you nothing.$k$pI do as I choose. You hold no sway
here—no power over me.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|B-but...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|I do appreciate how cooperative
you Askrans can be.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|The trade you wanted is done.
Now, allow us to return to Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|No... I'm afraid I can't allow that,
as it turns out.$k$pPrince Alfonse, Princess Sharena,
relinquish your weapons and
surrender to us.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what?! You got what you wanted
already, didn't you?!$k$pLet's go! We can withdraw and
return to address this once we're
able to—$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|The conditions have not changed.$k$pIf you do not comply with my wishes,
I will take your villages one by one
until you cooperate.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You... Don't do this! Please!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course! Of course... I have
no desire to bring harm on any
of you or your people.$k$pYou need only submit to my
demands, and we both can get
what we want out of this.$k$pYou need not worry over your
own safety. I would never harm a
visiting noble. You have my word.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If it means you'll stop attacking
villages, then...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Sharena. Wait.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|I can tell you need some time to
think it over. Take as long as you
need, but the facts will not change.$k$pWe'll be back for you.$k$p$Sbs500|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE13_08,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We can't let her get away with this.$k$pIf you two hand yourselves over,
you'll become political prisoners
at best—and likely worse.$k$pWe can't let that happen.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But if we don't do what she says,
the people of Askr will be closed
off by darkness until...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|If Director Letizia is the cause,
we have no choice but to force
her to return things to normal.$k$pIt won't be easy, but right now
there doesn't seem to be any
other option.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|This situation is problematic indeed.
As you observed, Prince Alfonse,
the source is Embla's power.$k$pHowever, allow me to assuage your
worries: I have been entrusted with
the powers of Askr.$k$pThough the precise solution is still
unclear, I believe there is a chance
Embla's enclosures can be reopened.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Really? That's such good news!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|To be clear, I can make no guarantee.
This is mere speculation on my part,
so I apologize if I fail, but...but...$k$p$EFace|I will do everything in my power
to help! I swear it—in the name
of happiness for all living things!$k$p$Sbs150|
